<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spellbook Prodigy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5025) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You are particularly adept at learning spells to add to your spellbook. You gain the [Magical Shorthand](/Feats.aspx?ID=5179) skill feat without needing to meet its prerequisites. Further, when you roll a critical failure on your check to [Learn a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2366), you get a failure instead.
name: Spellbook Prodigy
